alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS COUNTY THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Saint Augustine Shores to near Hastings. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South, Spuds, Anastasia, and Dupont Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
